title: Not My Job: Actor Jeff Goldblum Plays A Game Called 'Your Fly Is Open'
teaser: Goldblum starred in a 1986 movie called The Fly so we've invited him to answer three questions about zippers.
contentencoded:
We're recording our show in Pittsburgh this week â€” that's where Jeff Goldblum grew up and got his start as a performer playing piano in local clubs. He went on to become an actor in Hollywood, starring in Jurassic Park, Independence Day, Law & Order ... and a 1986 movie called The Fly.

We've invited Goldblum to play a game called "Your fly is open." Three questions about zippers.
